data.message:
Every Stan has a story in their life and you inspire them Sir........there was a time when I was bullied in my school by the seniors.......I found myself to be too weak to protest. At that time I did not even knew u. Then one day I heard your song 'not afraid' it inspired me so much. After that I no more afraid of those fucking seniors and I beat them black and blue. Not that I was not beaten I too got hurt but I learned that there are things u should not be afraid of.
Sir I know that u are busy with ur work but if u can please reply.
                                  A True Stan
